tags: Sunday Teaser (Aug. 31, 2025): The Bitcoin Chronicles: The Cathedral On Mars, 500 Years on (Teaser)
A reflection on permanence, pilgrimage, and the Cathedral on Mars — 500 years into humanity’s expansion.
content: *Five centuries from now, pilgrims will still pause beneath Martian arches, whispering gratitude before stepping into the stars. What we build together does not end with us — it points forward, to a permanence beyond our hands.*
